explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the application of machine learning models in cryptocurrency price prediction, highlighting their performance in quantitative finance.
explanations.supervised learning: The survey reviews current research trends in applications of supervised learning models in cryptocurrency price prediction.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper also mentions the use of reinforcement learning models in cryptocurrency price prediction as part of its survey.
explanations.neural network: Neural networks are likely discussed as part of the machine learning models applied in cryptocurrency markets, though not explicitly mentioned in the abstract.
explanations.deep learning: Deep learning is implied as part of the advanced machine learning techniques used in the complex and volatile cryptocurrency market.
